hero.title: Your pup deserves to be pampered
hero.subtitle: Expert grooming for dogs of all breeds and sizes. From basic baths to full spa treatments, we make grooming a positive experience. Gentle handling, premium products, and lots of treats!

about.title: Where Dogs Love to Visit
about.subtitle: Grooming with patience and care
about.content: Pampered Paws specializes in stress-free grooming for anxious and senior dogs. Our certified groomers take the time to build trust and make grooming enjoyable. We never rush and always put your dog's comfort first.

products.name: Full Grooming Package
products.description: Bath, haircut, nail trim, ear cleaning, and brush out. Perfect for most breeds. Includes bandana!

products.name: Bath & Brush
products.description: Refreshing bath with premium shampoo, blow dry, and thorough brushing. Great between full grooms.

products.name: Puppy First Groom
products.description: Gentle introduction to grooming for puppies under 6 months. Build positive associations early!

products.name: Senior Dog Special
products.description: Extra-gentle grooming for senior dogs. Comfortable table, frequent breaks, and lots of patience.

products.name: De-Shedding Treatment
products.description: Special shampoo and technique to remove loose undercoat. Reduce shedding by up to 80%!

products.name: Nail Trim Only
products.description: Quick nail trim for dogs who just need a touch-up. Walk-ins welcome!

services.title: Grooming Services
services.subtitle: Everything your dog needs to look and feel great

items.text: My anxious rescue dog actually wags his tail when we pull up! The groomers are so patient and gentle. He comes home looking amazing and happy. Best groomer ever!
items.author: Jessica Miller
items.title: Anxious Dog Parent

items.text: They handled my senior golden retriever with such care and respect. Took breaks when she needed it. She looked beautiful and wasn't stressed at all. Thank you!
items.author: Robert Thompson
items.title: Senior Dog Owner

items.text: Amazing with my doodle! Cut is perfect, she smells great, and they even sent me photos during grooming. Professional service and fair prices. We're customers for life!
items.author: Sarah Park
items.title: Doodle Mom

members.name: Laura Chen
members.title: Master Groomer & Owner
members.bio: 15+ years grooming dogs of all breeds. Certified by the National Dog Groomers Association. Specializes in anxious and senior dogs. Believes every dog deserves gentle, patient care.

steps.title: Book Appointment

steps.description: Meet your groomer and share any special requests

steps.title: Grooming Time
steps.description: We take our time and never rush your dog

steps.title: Pick Up Happy Pup
steps.description: Your dog comes home looking and smelling amazing!
